title: Full stack Nextjs Ecommerce App
subtitle: A Full-Stack Shopping Experience
description: I  Developed A fullstack Ecommerce Website using Nextjs13, Postgress, Prisma and Tailwind css

body.raw:
Full-Stack E-commerce Website with Next.js 13

I built a full-stack e-commerce website using Next.js 13, a cutting-edge React framework known for its performance and scalability. The website offers a user-friendly shopping experience with features like:

Product Browsing: Customers can easily explore a variety of products with clear descriptions and captivating visuals.
Shopping Cart: Users can add and manage items in their cart effortlessly.
Secure Checkout: The website integrates a secure payment gateway for safe and trusted transactions.
Technical Stack:

Next.js 13: Leveraged the power of Next.js 13 to create a fast, dynamic, and SEO-friendly e-commerce platform.
Tailwind CSS: Utilized Tailwind CSS, a utility-first framework, for rapid and responsive UI development.
Shadcn UI: Enhanced the user interface with pre-built components from Shadcn UI, saving development time and ensuring a polished look.
Cloudinary: Integrated Cloudinary, a cloud-based image management solution, for efficient image storage, optimization, and delivery.
Supabase: (potentially) Employed Supabase, a versatile open-source backend platform, for user authentication, database management, or other functionalities.
Prisma: (potentially) Utilized Prisma, an ORM (Object-Relational Mapper), to simplify interactions between your Next.js application and the PostgreSQL database.
PostgreSQL: Employed PostgreSQL, a robust and scalable relational database, to manage product data and user information securely.
Key Skills Demonstrated:

Full-Stack Development: This project highlights your proficiency in building both the front-end and back-end of a complex web application.
Modern Tech Stack: Your expertise in utilizing cutting-edge technologies like Next.js 13, Tailwind CSS, Cloudinary, Supabase (if applicable), and Prisma (if applicable) showcases your ability to stay up-to-date with industry trends.
E-commerce Functionality: The website demonstrates your understanding of core e-commerce features for a smooth user experience.

title: Fundi Kipusa
subtitle: Empowering Kenyan Youth Through Training
description: I helped Fundi Kipusa cbo develop a new  website and improved their online presence.

body.raw:
Fundi Kipusa is a Kenyan community-based organization website I built to showcase their mission of empowering young Kenyans with vital skills.

Website Purpose:

Highlight Training Programs: Fundi Kipusa offers training in various fields like agriculture, engineering, construction, and even blockchain technology. The website clearly presents these programs and their benefits.
Community Focus: The website emphasizes Fundi Kipusa's commitment to youth development and building a better future for Kenya.
Volunteer Opportunities: Attract potential volunteers who share Fundi Kipusa's vision by showcasing their impact and the opportunity to contribute.
Technical Skills Demonstrated:

Front-End Development: This project highlights my proficiency in building websites using fundamental web development technologies like HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript.
Informative Content Creation: The website effectively communicates Fundi Kipusa's mission, programs, and impact through well-structured and engaging content.
Community Focus: The design and content aim to build a sense of community and inspire user engagement.
This website demonstrates my ability to:

Translate a non-profit organization's mission into a user-friendly website.
Build a website with strong foundational web development skills.
Design a website that fosters a sense of community and purpose.

title: Kenya Coffee Events
subtitle: Ideas on the Frontiers of Innovation
description: I helped Kenya Coffee  develop a new  website and improved their online presence.

body.raw:
Kenya Coffee Events is your one-stop platform for discovering and engaging with the exciting world of Kenyan coffee. We showcase a curated selection of coffee events happening across the country, from barista championships and tastings to farm tours and industry conferences.

Here's what you'll find on Kenya Coffee Events:

Comprehensive Event Listings: Stay informed about upcoming coffee events in Kenya, with detailed descriptions, dates, locations, and registration information.
Industry Promotion: We celebrate Kenyan coffee's rich heritage and vibrant future by highlighting roasters, cafes, competitions, and other coffee-related businesses.
Community Hub: Connect with fellow coffee enthusiasts, share your experiences, and learn more about Kenya's diverse coffee offerings.


Built with cutting-edge technology:
Next.js: Experience a fast, user-friendly, and dynamic website.
Sanity CMS: Explore a user-friendly content management system for effortless event updates.

title: MERN Stack Admin Dashboard with Material UI and Recharts
subtitle: A Full-Stack Dashboard Built using the Mern stack
description: I  Developed A fullstack Dashboard Using The Mern Stack

body.raw:
MERN Stack Admin Dashboard with Material UI and Recharts

I built a comprehensive admin dashboard application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js). This robust tool empowers administrators with features like:

Data Visualization: Interactive charts and graphs powered by Recharts help visualize complex data for informed decision-making.
Data Management: The dashboard potentially allows administrators to view, edit, and manage various types of data relevant to their organization.
User Management: (possible feature) The application might include functionalities for managing user accounts and access control.
Technical Stack:

MERN Stack: Leveraged the MERN stack for a robust and scalable back-end and a dynamic front-end user interface.
Material UI: Utilized Material UI, a popular React component library from Google, for a clean, modern, and user-friendly interface.
Recharts: Integrated Recharts, a powerful charting library for React, to create interactive and customizable visualizations.
Key Skills Demonstrated:

Full-Stack Development: This project highlights your ability to build both the front-end and back-end of a web application.
MERN Stack Proficiency: Your expertise in utilizing the MERN stack demonstrates your understanding of popular full-stack development technologies.
Data Visualization: The use of Recharts showcases your ability to create insightful data visualizations for effective decision-making.
User Interface Design: Material UI integration highlights your skills in building user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces.

title: Mern Ecommerce
subtitle: A Full-Stack Shopping Experience (MERN Stack)
description: I  Developed A fullstack Ecommerce Website using the Mern Stack.

body.raw:
MERN Ecommerce App is a full-stack e-commerce website I built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js). This application allows users to browse products, add items to their cart, and complete secure purchases.

Key Features:

Product Catalog: Explore a diverse range of products with detailed descriptions, images, and variations (if applicable).
User Accounts: Create accounts to manage profiles, track order history, and personalize the shopping experience.
Shopping Cart: Add and remove items from the cart with ease, view running totals, and proceed to checkout securely.
Secure Checkout: Implement a secure payment gateway to ensure safe and reliable transactions.
Technical Stack:

MERN Stack: Utilize the full power of the MERN stack for robust functionality on both the front-end (React.js) and back-end (Node.js and Express.js), with data persistence handled by MongoDB.
E-commerce Functionality: Integrate features essential for a seamless online shopping experience, including product management, user authentication, shopping cart management, and secure payment processing.
This project demonstrates my expertise in:

Full-Stack Development: Effectively combining front-end and back-end technologies to create a comprehensive e-commerce application.
MERN Stack Proficiency: Building a robust and scalable e-commerce platform using the MERN stack.
E-commerce Functionality: Implement core features for a user-friendly and secure online shopping experience

title: Villa Jahawi
subtitle: Modern Website with Next.js 13, Content Layer, and MDX
description: I helped Villa Jahawi a Villa located in  Diani  develop a new  website and improved their online presence.

client.name: Villa Jawahi
client.description: Modern Website with Next.js 13, Content Layer, and MDX

body.raw:
I built a modern website for Villa Jahawi using Next.js 13, a powerful React framework known for its performance and scalability. The website offers a visually captivating experience with features like:

Rich Content: The Content Layer and MDX (Markdown extensions) potentially allow for the creation of dynamic and engaging content pages with embedded multimedia elements.
Seamless Navigation: Next.js 13 ensures a smooth and user-friendly browsing experience across all devices.
SEO Optimization: (likely feature) The website is likely built with SEO (Search Engine Optimization) best practices in mind, increasing its visibility in search engine results.
Technical Stack:

Next.js 13: Leveraged the power of Next.js 13 to create a fast, dynamic, and SEO-friendly website.
Content Layer: (potentially) Utilized a headless Content Layer solution, enabling a flexible and scalable approach to content management. This allows for content to be edited and managed independently from the front-end code.
MDX: (potentially) Integrated MDX, a powerful extension to Markdown, to create rich content experiences with embedded components and dynamic elements.
Key Skills Demonstrated:

Modern Web Development: This project showcases your expertise in using cutting-edge technologies like Next.js 13, Content Layer (if applicable), and MDX (if applicable).
Content Management: Your understanding of headless CMS (Content Management System) principles through the potential use of a Content Layer demonstrates your ability to manage content efficiently.
User Experience (UX) Design: The use of Next.js 13 likely contributes to a smooth and visually appealing user experience.
